sections.purpose: To assess locomotor activity, exploration, and anxiety in a novel environment.
sections.scope: Applicable to behavioral and psychopharmacological studies.
procedure: Place the animal gently in the center or a corner of the open field.
Start the timer and observe for a fixed duration (e.g., 5â€“10 minutes).
Record parameters such as crossings, rearing, grooming, and time in center vs periphery.
Remove the animal and return it to the home cage.
Clean the apparatus with 70% alcohol between subjects.
precautions: Do not test animals immediately after stressful procedures.
Handle animals gently before and after testing.
